name: cox-bazar
description:
As the longest sea beach in the world, Cox’s Bazar is considered the most popular tourist destination in Bangladesh. Do you know Cox’s Bazar is familiar as the tourist capital of Bangladesh? Yes! If you consider blue water beauty, accommodation solution, security, and fresh seafood, this natural sandy sea beach is the most amazing place to travel again and again. Not to mention, every time you visit the Cox’s Bazar you will feel the unforgettable majestic view.

To point out, the City was named with the British captain Hiram Cox. As a matter of fact, it is 150km away from Chittagong city. In like manner, the length of this unbroken sandy beach is 120km and it is the most enjoying place for watching the sunset closely. Equally important, the local food is very delicious, especially those who loves seafood. That is to say, you can take a bath, swim as well as play the games on the beach without any fair with your friends and families, as the beach area is the Shark free zone. In one word, it is the coolest place for enjoying your holidays or a yearly vacation. The most attractive places in Cox’s Bazar are Ramu, Laboni Beach, Enani beach, Himchari and many more.

Which beach area Travel Mate will cover in this packaged tour?

1. Laboni Beach

Laboni Beach is the heart of Cox’s Bazar tourist attraction. Notably, it is approximately 15km long in the Cox’s Bazar Sadar Upazila. The beach is also popular for its sandy area. From Cox’s Bazar town, you will get the Laboni Beach first. significantly, you will find a lot of shops for buying beach accessories and souvenirs. At night the beach is fully secured for adding extra tourist police here. For this reason, you can move and sit at night to watch the moonlit night or feeling the beauty of the Bay of Bengal.

2. Inani beach

Inani Beach which is located in Ukhia Upazilla, Cox’s Bazar and it is 35km south from the district. It is the best beach in Cox’s Bazar for those who want to stay in a calm environment. Because the tourists mostly gather in Laboni Beach. The beach is famous for clear blue water and stony areas. In fact, it is ideal who want to explore the sea and want to see the sunset.

3. Himchari

Himchari- the place where you will find the amazing waterfalls, 18km south from Cox’s Bazar district. Another key point, when you will visit Himchari, the roadside is very attractive as it goes to the side of the Bay of Bengal and hills on the other side.

Overall, the tour can be very enjoyable if you want to take the fresh air from the very close of nature. Let’s see the Package details of Travel Mate at a glance. Don’t forget to see the guideline of TravelMate from the next tab (itinerary).
inclusion:
INCLUSION

 package food
 hotel cost

EXCLUSION

 personal charge
 medicine
itineraries:
We will follow the below schedule to complete the whole tour. It will help us to save the time and enjoying the moment efficiently in the right place.

Day 00 Dhaka – Cox’s Bazar:

At first, we will meet together at 9:00 PM at Rajarbag. Then we will discuss our overall plan and activities. Take your dinner before the journey. At 10:00 PM we will take our seat on the bus. Our journey will start now. Take sleep on the bus as soon as possible to enjoy the coming day on the Cox’s Bazar Sea Beach.

  • Meet & greetings at 9:00 PM
  • Start for Cox’s Bazar at 10:00 PM from Rajarbag
  • Overnight Bus journey.

Day 01 Cox’s Bazar:

We will arrive before 7:00 AM. Now take your bag/luggage carefully.  In Addition, we will confirm our hotel room. Then come back from the hotel. We will take the breakfast at our own cost. Now take rest for 30 minutes and start to visit Himchory and Inani Coral Beach with an open jeep. We will stay for the whole day here. Enjoy the beach and take lunch. Take bath on the beach or play games. You can do anything you desire except which is not permitted in the public place. Enjoy the sunset at the Inani Beach. Now the time to return. We will return our hotel before 9:00 PM. Meet at the selected place of Travel Mate.

  • Arrive early in the morning and confirm your hotel room
  • Take Breakfast at hotel (own cost)
  • Start to visit Himchory and coral beach Innani by open Jeep
  • Overnight stay in the hotel.

Day 02 Cox’s Bazar:

In the day 2nd, we will go to Laboni Beach. It is an amazing place to enjoy the beauty of the beach. You will find a lot of rides to make your time more acceptable. Take bath and Enjoy the sea sight. You can play games or go away from outcry or noisy area. Complete your lunch and get back to the beach again. You can go shopping. At 8:00 PM, it is time to return the hotel. Take dinner and enjoy the night at the side of the sea.

  • Breakfast at hotel
  • We will visit Laboni Beach today
  • Easy & free time for shopping or self-activity
  • Overnight stay in the hotel

Day 03 Cox’s Bazar – Dhaka:

This day is for your own activities. Everyone wants to take some memory from the beach. For this reason, you will find the beach accessories and souvenirs, choose anything and buy it for your friends and family. Visit the shops and take seafood if necessary for your daily needs. Needs to remember, today we will start our returning journey at 12:00 PM. So, complete the whole things before 10:00 AM and come back to the hotel and complete your daily task. After completing lunch, we will catch our Bus at 12:00 PM. We hope, we will reach Dhaka before 10:00 PM. Returning to the Dhaka, go back to your sweet home and start your daily activities from the next day.

  • Breakfast at hotel
  • Do some shopping
  • Start back to Dhaka at 12:00 PM
  • Arrive Dhaka at 10:00 PM
  • Back to your sweet home and end of the trip

Have a safe and enjoyable journey with Travel Mate. Thanks a lot. Hope we will go all together again.

name: sundarban
description:
Happy to reintroduce, the Sundarbans is one of the largest mangrove forests and natural wonders in the world. UNESCO has listed the Sundarbans as the World Heritage List for its beauty and ongoing ecological processes. If you want to take the taste of deep forests in Bangladesh and explore the wildlife for some days, the Sundarbans tour can be your best choice. Located at the side of Bay Of Bengal, Sundarbans is the home of Royal Bengal Tigers, spotted deer, claw-less otters, salt-water crocodiles and many other wildlife species. Fortunately, the tour can bring you to see the life of a forest closely.

Travel Mate arranges the tour in an organized way to give you the best experience for surfing the forests. The Sundarbans tour will start early in the morning from Khulna. We will also end the journey from the same place (Khulna) or leave for Dhaka. Are you confused about where you will stay in the forests? How will you get the safety? Our specialists will do everything for you. You will stay on the specially designed boat or ship and it will be only for your travel mate. We will explore the sanctuary through the creeks and canals as well as we will use the wooden country boat to visit the remote area of the Sundarbans. Experienced guide of Travel Mate will instruct the whole tour for not missing any vital sight or wildlife with safety.

The tours of Travel Mate are organized and we try to improve the collaboration with one another. The tours follow the rule, but no consideration when the time for engaging and entertaining. You can consider it as a family tour. Important to realize, you are going to explore the wildlife, and our primary motives are fulfilling your desire. Do you think about the pricing modules? Especially, we try to do all the available things with cheaper packages. As our expert guides are used to travel the Sundarbans, in the meanwhile, we can offer the best flexible package for you. Let’s check the details about the packages.

Destination

     Sundarbans Tour 

Duration     03 Days & 04 Nights
Departure Time     Please arrive at least 1 hour before the journey.
Included
  • Dhaka-Khulna-Dhaka Air Conditioned Bus/Train Tickets
  • 2 Night Accommodation on the boat/ship in a sleeping cabin.
  • 5,750 BDT (forest permission fee for foreigner) per person.
  • All meals starting from breakfast on day-01, drinking water, tea, and coffee.
  • English speaking guide available.
inclusion:
INCLUSION

 package food
 hotel cost

EXCLUSION

 personal charge
 medicine
itineraries:
Day-01: Khulna to Kotka

  • We will departure from Dhaka at 7.00 PM. After reaching on the Khulna in the morning (6.30AM), we will finish our breakfast. We will finish reporting to the authorities. Then we will start for the Sundarbans from the Khulna Lunch Terminal .
  • We will reach on the Kotka wildlife sanctuary after within 7-8 hours and in the meantime, we will take our launch. Then taking some rest on the ship, we will explore the Kotka forest area. You will really love the place. We will move to see the wildlife and birds. In the evening, we will return to the ship again.

Day-02: Kotka to Kochikhali Wildlife sanctuary

  • Having breakfast at 07.00AM,  we will start the day-02 tour. We will go by small boat to explore the deep side of the Kochikhali Wildlife sanctuary. We will get the Jamtola Beach and we will spend less than one hour on the beach following the situation of the environment. Not to mention Jamtola Beach is the quietest, nicest, and cleanest beach in Bangladesh. Again we will hike toward Kotka forest station to catch the new boat through the forest.
  • We will take the Lunch on the ship. Yes! It will be on the river and among the forest. Now we will take rest a couple of hours on the ship.
  • Now we will go to the watchtower on the Kotka and explore the beauty of the Sundarbans. We will stay here till the evening. Take some snacks and wait to see what surprises will happen here. Surprisingly, it is one of the feeding places of the animals. You will see one after another is coming to take the water or for feeding. We can’t express all the things here!
  • On the night, we will arrange a BBQ party here with the honor of our guests. Yes! We’ll are the guest of this undiscoverable forests. With a busy life, it’s not possible to go every part of this forests. So, we’ll enjoy the nights with the animals and try to feel the nature. Fortunately, if you have the thirst of nature, it can be the best night ever in your life and Travel Mate wants to give you such a feeling.

Day-3: Explore the Kochikhali Wildlife sanctuary in the daytime and prepare to return Khulna

  • At the beginning of the morning, we will start today. We will take the boat and will go to some remote area of the Kochikhali Sanctuary to take the more close touch of the forest. After riding 1 or 2 hours (Depending on the situation) we will return to the main ship before 8 AM. Now take the breakfast and start the journey to return on Khulna.
  • Reach Khulna in the daylight, and we’ll maintain some formality. At last, we will join our bus/train for Dhaka. End of the tour.

name: rangamati
description:
Rangamati is a small town of the Chittagong Division and a district in south-eastern Bangladesh. Rangamati is covered with green hills, lakes, and rivers. For this reason, the tourist from Bangladesh and abroad like the place for passing the free time. In general, it is situated at the side of Kaptai Lake, that’s why Rangamati is considered as the Lake City Of Bangladesh. Important to realize, it is the largest district in Bangladesh is just 77 km away from Chittagong town. For the tradition of the tribal people, scenic beauty, type of locations and natural resources including diverse flora and fauna have made the place more attractive.

The tour of Travel Mate will give you a special opportunity to enjoy the Rangamati tour more closely. In addition, you have the most chances to meet with the tribal villages including Chakma, Marma, Tonchongya, Tripura, Murong, Bome, Khumi, Kheyang, Chak, Pankhoa, and Lusai. Culture and diverse traditions will give you an exciting experience. The beauty of the hilly areas, lake and greeny location, will give the amazing feeling to go very near to nature.

The most attractive places in Rangamati are Kaptai Lake, Tribal Museum, Shuvolong Falls, Hanging Bridge, Rajban Bihar Pagoda, Kaptai National Park, Chakma Royal Palace, Peda Ting Ting, and DC Bungalow Area. The tour of Travel Mate will cover most of the attractive places from here. The natural beauty and fresh air will give you amazing feelings. For knowing the details, check the itinerary section. Let’s check the package details of Travel Mate.

Destination

Rangamati Tour

Duration03 Nights & 02 Days
Departure TimePlease arrive at least 2 hours before the flight.
Included
  • 01 night’s accommodation at Sufia international & PBC Motel in Twin sharing basis.
  • Breakfast at the hotel.
  • Return A/C/Non-Ac bus for Dhaka- Rangamati – Dhaka
  • All sightseeing as per above itinerary by reserved boat.
inclusion:
INCLUSION

 package food
 hotel cost

EXCLUSION

 personal charge
 medicine
itineraries:
The detailed guideline for Rangamati will explain here. Travel Mate will follow the rules in the complete tour. The tour of Travel Mate is organized and entertaining as you will get all the desired things at your hand. Let’s see the Itinerary in detail of the Rangamati Tours.

Day 00 Dhaka – Rangamati:

Firstly, we will meet at 9:00 PM and the bus will start from Dhaka at 9:30 PM. Before the journey, the guide will welcome you and explain to you the detailed plan. Check everything is okay and finish the booking of you from the guide. At last, the bus will start at 9:30 PM. After leaving Dhaka City, take a sound sleep and prepare to start for the next day.

  • Departure for Rangamati by AC or Non-AC coach at 9:30 PM.
  • Overnight bus journey (Dhaka to Rangamati).

Day 01 Rangamati:

We will reach Rangamati before 7:00 AM. We will check in on the hotel first. After finishing breakfast, we will come back to enjoy the tour. We will take a reserved boat from the Hanging Bridge and will explore the lake. It is the most amazing fact at Rangamati We will finish our launch here. However, we will explore the Pada Ting Ting, Rajbari, and Shuvolong too. In the evening we will return to the hotel. Take your dinner and take a rest. Go for sleep ASAP to start the next day from the early morning.

  • We will reach early in the morning.
  • Check-in hotel
  • Start for sightseeing by reserved boat Hanging Bridge, Rajbari, Pada Ting Ting, and Shuvolong.
  • Back to hotel & overnight at hotel.

Day 02 Explore Rangamati:

This is the day of yours. We will explore the local spot with the CNG. You can go or refer anywhere in Rangamati to explore. You can go to any tribal villages to take the company of them. Our guide will give you the instructions. Important to realize, You can go to the local shop to buy anything for your near and dear ones. You will find local foods to enjoy it. Come back to the hotel before the evening. We will check out from the Hotel and move to Bus Counter at 8 PM .

  • Take breakfast
  • Easy and free day for self-activity

Day 03 Rangamati – Dhaka:

  • We will arrive in Dhaka the next day morning.
  • Go back to your sweet home and End of the trip

The tour is finished. Congratulation from the Travel Mate family. Keep checking our social media or website. Thanks a lot.

name: bandarban
description:
Bandarban is located in the south-eastern part of Bangladesh on the Chittagong division. Important to realize, among the three Chittagong Hill Tracks districts, Bandarban is one of them. In addition, it is the most beautiful and picturesque place in Bangladesh. It is one of the attractive travel destinations is just 77 km away from the Chittagong city. In Bandarban, the most beautiful tourist spots are Boga Lake, Chimbuk Hill and Tribal Villages,  Buddha Dhatu Jadi, Keokradong, Nilachal Tourist Spot, Mirinja Parjatan, Meghla Tourist Spot, Nafakhum and Remakri, Nilgiri and Thanchi, Rijuk Waterfall, Prantik Lake, Sangu River, Tajingdong, Shoilo Propat, and Upabon Parjatan.

In this 03 days and 02 nights tour of Travel Mate, we will cover the most scenic and coolest spot including Meghla tourist spot,  Nilgiri, Nilachal  & Golden Temple, and Chimbuk Hill (Darjeeling of Bengal) & Waterfalls.

To emphasize, Bandarban is popular for the hills, waterfalls and ethnic people. In particular, we find 12 communities of the ethnic people in Bandarban. Each tribe has their individual culture, religions, tradition, dress code, food, and language. To clarify, you will find the tribe villages in every tourist spot. It is very amazing to hear the story of them. By the same token, you will find the highest peaks in Bangladesh named Tajingdong (Height 4632 feet).

The tour of Travel Mate covers the main attraction spot of Bandarban including hills, waterfalls and ethnic villages. Moreover, if you consider the package, you will realize the matter. Let’s check the packages of Travel Mate in details. (See the Itinerary section for the complete guideline of the tours)

Destination      Bandarban Tours
Duration      03 Days & 02 Nights

Departure Time

      Please arrive at least 1 hour before the journey.

  • 02 nights Twin Accommodation at Parjatan Motel/Plaza Bandarban in AC rooms
  • Daily breakfast at the hotel
  • Return Non-AC/AC bus tickets for Dhaka- Bandarban – Dhaka
  • All sightseeing as per above itinerary by Non A/C local jeep.
Tour Cost     Per Person Cost: Call  01766990725 for details.

itineraries:
The tour of Travel Mate is organized and entertaining as you will get all the desired things at your hand. Let’s see the Itinerary in details of the Bandarban tours.

Day 00 Dhaka – Bandarban:

We will start the journey at 10:30 PM. So, you need to reach the previously mentioned place at 9:30 PM. Check if everything is okay and if you have finished the dinner. After reaching the bus station, confirm your seat. Now the guide will describe the tour plan. At 10:30 PM the bus will start from Dhaka. Check everything is fine. Now take sleep to start the day with refreshment.

  • We will depart for Bandarban by AC bus at 10:30 PM.
  • Overnight bus journey.

Day 01 Bandarban (Nilachal and Golden Temple):

We will arrive at Bandarban in the early morning (Before 7:00 AM). Likewise, we will check in our hotel and will take breakfast as early as possible. Now we will visit Meghla tourist spot on foot as it is walking distance from the hotel. We will finish visiting the Meghla Tourist Spot before 12:00 PM. Now we will finish our launch in any restaurant. After taking a break for 30 minutes, we will go to visit Nilachal and Golden Temple. We will explore the Nilachal and Golden Temple before the evening. Really it will be a fantastic day for storing in your memory. Then we will return to the hotel. Accordingly, take sleep and prepare yourself for the next day.

  • We will reach early in the morning.
  • Checking in the hotel BPC and take breakfast at Restaurant
  • Start for sightseeing on foot to Meghla tourist spot.
  • After lunch start visit to Nilachal and Golden Temple.
  • Back to hotel and overnight at the hotel.

Day 02 Bandarban (Nilgiri & Chimbuk Hill):

In the 2nd day, after finishing our breakfast we will start our journey for Nilgiri with a reserved jeep. On the way, we will finish exploring the Chimbuk Hill. Then we will go to the Nilgiri. Not to mention, Nilgiri Hill is a very beautiful place to take the fresh breath and feeling the touch of nature. We will stay here till evening. Thus we will finish another amazing day in Bandarban. Now we will come back to the hotel. Be organized, complete your dinner and go to sleep for starting the next day.

  • After breakfast start for sightseeing by reserved jeep, Nilgiri on the way visiting Chimbuk Hill (Darjeeling of Bengal) & Waterfalls.
  • Back hotel and overnight stay.

Day 03 Bandarban – Dhaka:

The third day of the tour is only for yours. You can go and do what you want. You can explore the surroundings and can meet the local tribe. At the same time, you can take the taste of the local foods. At 8 PM, you need to check out from the hotel. After completing our dinner, we will start back to Dhaka at 10:00 PM. We will arrive early in the morning. Back to your sweet home and start your daily task.

  • Easy & free day up to the evening.
  • Check out hotel at  8:00 PM
  • Start back to Dhaka at 10:00 PM
  • Overnight Bus journey
  • Arrive Dhaka at early in the morning
  • Go back to your sweet home & End the trip

Thanks all from the Travel Mate family. Hope you have enjoyed the Bandarban journey. We will start planning for another place for you. Stay connected with us.

termsAndConditions:
TERMS AND CONDITION

With Travel Architecture, everything is affordable and easy. Along with Multiple payment methods like Cash, Cheque, Card, Mobile Finance, we also provide a monthly instalment option for all of our services using your credit card, if you do not want to pay upfront!

Paying through our EMI is very easy. You are eligible for EMI with any purchase over BDT 10,000. So you can easily Travel now and pay later!

You can easily calculate how much you need to pay per month for your EMI plans with Travel Architecture.

Let’s assume you are planning to purchase a service worth BDT 10,000 from Travel Architecture. With a bank processing fee of 9% for 12 months, you’ll be charged 10,900. A POS charge of 1.5% will be applicable over that amount and in total, you’ll need to pay BDT 11114. Which is BDT 926 per month.

Special Note: We accept payments of services ONLY at our official bank accounts.
